Please update the following program based on this instruction: Please fix the following error in the program:
Unexpected character «`» at line 2:   ```Python

Here's the current program:
```Python
from vpython import sphere, vector, color, rate, graph, gdots, label, pi

# Constants
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1
theta = 0.1  # Initial angle
g = 9.81  # Gravity

# Create pendulum
ceiling = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(0.2, 0.01, 0.2), color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(Length_I * theta, -Length_I, 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(pos=ceiling.pos, axis=ball.pos - ceiling.pos, radius=0.01, color=color.gray)

# Create graph
g1 = graph(title='Pendulum', xtitle='Time', ytitle='Angle')
dots = gdots(graph=g1, color=color.black)

# Simulation parameters
t = 0
dt = 0.01
ball.velocity = vector(0, 0, 0)

# Calculate period
T = 2 * pi * (Length_I / g)**0.5

# Simulate motion
while True:
    rate(100)
    alpha = -(g / Length_I) * ball.pos.y / Length_I
    ball.velocity += vector(0, alpha, 0) * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    rod.axis = ball.pos - rod.pos
    t += dt
    dots.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    label(pos=vector(5, 5, 0), text='Period: {:.2f}s'.format(T), height=10, box=False)
```

interactions.output:
from vpython import sphere, vector, color, rate, graph, gdots, label, pi, box, cylinder

# Constants
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1
theta = 0.1  # Initial angle
g = 9.81  # Gravity

# Create pendulum
ceiling = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(0.2, 0.01, 0.2), color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(Length_I * theta, -Length_I, 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(pos=ceiling.pos, axis=ball.pos - ceiling.pos, radius=0.01, color=color.gray)

# Create graph
g1 = graph(title='Pendulum', xtitle='Time', ytitle='Angle')
dots = gdots(graph=g1, color=color.black)

# Simulation parameters
t = 0
dt = 0.01
ball.velocity = vector(0, 0, 0)

# Calculate period
T = 2 * pi * (Length_I / g)**0.5

# Simulate motion
while True:
    rate(100)
    alpha = -(g / Length_I) * ball.pos.y / Length_I
    ball.velocity += vector(0, alpha, 0) * dt
    ball.pos += ball.velocity * dt
    rod.axis = ball.pos - rod.pos
    t += dt
    dots.plot(t, ball.pos.y)
    label(pos=vector(5, 5, 0), text='Period: {:.2f}s'.format(T), height=10, box=False)
